sentences.sContent: Not arrogate to oneself professions9 see joke : My friendly mouth is stupid very , often say the footle that a few your people find both funny and annoying .
sentences.sContent_eng: Not arrogate to oneself professions9 see joke : My friendly mouth is stupid very , often say the footle that a few your people find both funny and annoying .
sentences.sCn: 不擅表白9看笑话：我友的嘴甚是笨，常常说一些令人哭笑不得的呆话。

synos.tran: 做笨事；说呆话；浪费时间

remMethod.val: foot(脚) + le → 走来走去 → 浪费(时间)
